speaker: Ledger
lines: You read the names aloud from the ledger.
Your breath fogs lightly in the cool air.
Salt lines sit in neat rows along the page.
The portraits seem less watchful when you finish.
You find a small bone charm tucked in the gutter.
The air settles and the room is still.
The ring on the floor is cool to the touch.

give_item.name: Bone Charm
give_item.description: A charm that makes names behave
